About

Michael Rose Fine Art provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Northeast art, Collection advisory, Curatorial projects. With Since 2014 experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.

Local appraiser focused on historical to contemporary Northeast art for collectors and artists.
